context.rdfs:comment: A specific question - e.g. from a user seeking answers online, or collected in a Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) document.
context.rdfs:label: Question

properties.rdfs:comment: The number of answers this question has received.
properties.rdfs:label: answerCount

properties.rdfs:comment: The answer(s) that has been accepted as best, typically on a Question/Answer site. Sites vary in their selection mechanisms, e.g. drawing on community opinion and/or the view of the Question author.
properties.rdfs:label: acceptedAnswer

properties.rdfs:comment: An answer (possibly one of several, possibly incorrect) to a Question, e.g. on a Question/Answer site.
properties.rdfs:label: suggestedAnswer
